motifs.name: Neon Workshop Networks
motifs.description: Switchboards of desire built from severed telephone lines, neon furnaces, and fractal corridors that reroute connection into abstract circuitry.
example_lines: a dark workshop of telephone wires
capture her hand in the neon furnace
making phone calls through an octal system of severed wires
slide into the fractal maze

motifs.name: Combustion Rituals
motifs.description: Heat, fire, and glowing embers recur as transforming agents that scorch relationships, voices, and bodies.
example_lines: and ill float down stream and burn inside the neon furnace
Everytime I feel fire in me
Fire between us all tonight
Fireflies rise from purple shadow

motifs.name: Systemic Logistics Mania
motifs.description: Industrial language, ratchets, resumes, and trains fuse into a portrait of people consumed by process and acquisition.
example_lines: Ratchets on the other end of the line
I'd like to acquire your system if you don't mind me asking
Everyone loves him he is very mad about the trains
Players understand the game their playing

motifs.name: Domestic Altars in Decay
motifs.description: Homes, sofas, kitchens, and bedrooms tilt toward collapse with spoiled groceries, recycled furniture, and shared beds that feel like shrines.
example_lines: Expires like the milk in our house in the north
Months in debt accrue before a second hand sofa
Syrup drips from the spoon
Come lie with me in the shade
feelings: It hurts to admit it's over

motifs.name: Spectral Doubles and Body Wiring
motifs.description: Bodies split into shadows, spectral outlines, and electrical wiring, suggesting unstable identities and mirrored selves.
example_lines: I feel a spectral copy of my body
I find myself casting multiple shadows down a fractal hallway
a body of electrical wires
My door opens like a mazarati

motifs.name: Family Volcano Echoes
motifs.description: Family members, childhood artifacts, and parental rituals erupt inside kitchen-table disasters and volcanic reunions.
example_lines: He stole my Yu Gi oh card and I haven't forgiven him
My mother is crying and syrup drips from the spoon
The two brothers meet for a final time inside a volcano
He is in a cardboard box travelling towards the moon

motifs.name: Island Drift and Air Turbulence
motifs.description: Planes, islands, and oceanic routes recur as unstable ground for escape attempts and wandering futures.
example_lines: Let's have some babies in the Bermuda Triangle
Small plane over Jurassic island
One of these days I'm going to find myself away from this island
On a certain track you imagine yourself as a pile of leaves on top of a chemical mountain

motifs.name: Stagecraft and Techno Observation
motifs.description: Concerts, headphones, fashion crews, and backstage vantage points capture performance culture as a distant tableau.
example_lines: The music was horrible so we put on our headphones and spoke to each other through microphones
The girl with all the makeup does the styling for that band that started techno
Watching the stage from afar with my binoculars
Filter words through smooth beautiful blue thought

motifs.name: Hybrid Creatures and Body Morphs
motifs.description: Bodies fuse with animals, objects, and geological matter, creating surreal hybrids and shifting anatomies.
example_lines: Purple dog boy fluffed out a pillow before he had a chance at life
The Phoenix child loves to run
Sleeping wolf clutches at the earth feeling the texture of time
Hairy brown coconut wedged in between the mouth of a pregnant woman

motifs.name: Alpha Fraternity Theatre
motifs.description: Media-soaked houses where alpha rotations, sarcasm drills, and consumer rituals script belonging.
sensory_cues: sarcasm delivered in scraped metal tones
example_lines: Americans think in movies. We drive a car down a sketchy drveway.
Group think at a maximum.
Whoever is alpha male changes from night to night.
They are terrified of people being weird.
feelings: I fall in love with their women

motifs.name: Bubble-Wrap Arcade Gallery
motifs.description: Marble arcades lined with bubble-wrapped frames, immigrant portraits, and pop-art winks posing as conversation.
example_lines: Cooing of gentle conversation in the arcade , unifentified chains clink
Walls covered in bubble wrap, fragments of photo frames .
Immigrant families in colonial frills smile peacefully out at you
A sassy middle aged woman ... winking suggestively - do you want a piece of this ?

motifs.name: Pop Icon Collage
motifs.description: Celebrity apparitions populate restaurants and rehab wards, mixing tabloid excess with uneasy awe.
example_lines: Justin Bieber and his girlfriend having dinner at a Chinese restaurant.
Everyone is frightened by Justin's new tattoo
Magic Johnson is a rehab
It's where all the creatives go

motifs.name: Engine Choir Mechanics
motifs.description: Warehouse rehearsals of engines, plastic horns, and magnetic ink performing nervous maintenance rituals.
example_lines: hold a bag of engine oil inside a sore stomach
plastic horns wobble their before quivering tunes
bleeping red light holds tounges
within lake intensity a green room painted before me

visions.title: Neon furnace call center
visions.summary: A workshop of telephone wires loops into a glowing furnace while severed octal lines spark like stalled conversations.

elements.image: workbenches stacked with tangled telephone cords
elements.action: sparks jump as hands splice octal wires

elements.image: a neon furnace with a hand suspended inside
elements.action: fingers held just above the flame as if awaiting instruction

elements.image: maze of fractal corridors
elements.action: footsteps echo and double back without finding an exit

source_lines: a dark workshop of telephone wires
capture her hand in the neon furnace
making phone calls through an octal system of severed wires
slide into the fractal maze

visions.title: Kitchen shrine of spoiled milk
visions.summary: In a northern house, expired milk and second-hand furniture become a household altar lit by a flickering lantern.

elements.image: second hand sofa sagging beside a kitchen table
elements.action: someone checks cushions for hidden coins and finds only dust

elements.image: milk jug sweating on the counter
elements.action: clumps slide toward the sink but never spill

elements.image: lantern wobbling in a grey room
elements.action: light stretches across hanging clothes and mud-crusted shoes

source_lines: Expires like the milk in our house in the north
Grey rooms , hanging clothes , mud on the bottom of my shoe
Only flood lights lead me home

visions.title: Wesley's revolving boardroom
visions.summary: A logistics evangelist holds court while resumes, trains, and systems blur into a feverish acquisition ritual.

elements.image: conference table stacked with cloud sourced resumes
elements.action: hands thrust papers forward like offerings

elements.image: team leader with a whistle swing in his voice
elements.action: paces while describing train schedules and customer experience charts

elements.image: projector casting logistics diagrams onto sweating faces
elements.action: lines of data ripple as if alive

source_lines: The men on board Are false alarms it's all logistics to them
I'd like to acquire your system if you don't mind me asking
He's really mad about the trains

visions.title: Syrup kitchen volcano
visions.summary: Family members circle a kitchen while syrup drips, cats scratch, and brothers reunite inside a volcanic vision.

elements.image: mother holding a spoon over the sink
elements.action: amber syrup threads down into a shadowed bowl

elements.image: father closing theatre doors with a stick
elements.action: shadows knot on the hallway walls

elements.image: two brothers crouched inside a volcano crater
elements.action: breathing steam while a cardboard box-rocket glows nearby

source_lines: My mother is crying and syrup drips from the spoon
Father fetches the stick and closes the doors to the theatre room
The two brothers meet for a final time inside a volcano
He is in a cardboard box travelling towards the moon

visions.title: Fractal hallway split
visions.summary: A figure watches their spectral copy peel away, casting multiple shadows while hybrid creatures hover nearby.

elements.image: violet outline lifting from a seated body
elements.action: spectral jaws bite at empty air

elements.image: hallway folding like mirrored paper
elements.action: doors open like a maserati gullwing onto more corridors

elements.image: purple dog boy and phoenix child waiting at the bend
elements.action: tilt heads as if receiving instructions

source_lines: I feel a spectral copy of my body
casting multiple shadows down a fractal hallway
her lips fall open to reveal knuckledusters
Purple dog boy fluffed out a pillow before he had a chance at life

visions.title: Triangle flight path
visions.summary: Flights skim dangerous islands while riders joke about Bermuda plans, exploding trees, and gasoline-scented beaches.

elements.image: small plane rattling above a Jurassic island
elements.action: wheel shakes as clouds part to reveal an unprotected beach

elements.image: couple sketching babies inside the Bermuda Triangle
elements.action: maps spread across tray tables with grease stains

elements.image: motorcycle idling near exploding trees
elements.action: gasoline fumes mingle with sea foam mist

source_lines: Let's have some babies in the Bermuda Triangle
Small plane over Jurassic island
Ride into th future with a piece of bacon and a cook book
Sea foam a lifeline bleeps motorcycle engine the smell of gasoline

visions.title: Headphones at the pop-up show
visions.summary: Observers watch a techno scene from the edge, using headphones and microphones to create their own quiet channel.

elements.image: friends wearing headphones on the dance floor
elements.action: speak through microphones while the main speakers blare elsewhere

elements.image: stylist adjusting a band's makeup backstage
elements.action: hands dust glitter while techno loops

elements.image: observer with binoculars near a pop-up restaurant
elements.action: eats while staring at the stage from afar

source_lines: The music was horrible so we put on our headphones and spoke to each other through microphones
The girl with all the makeup does the styling for that band that started techno
Watching the stage from afar with my binoculars

visions.title: Island drift beacon
visions.summary: Hovercrafts, chemical mountains, and leaf piles anchor a drifting sense of travel with hybrid guardians.

elements.image: hovercraft skimming above a foggy bay
elements.action: cargo of flowers pinned to the deck

elements.image: pile of leaves breathing atop a chemical mountain
elements.action: doppelganger offers a hand from the hillside

elements.image: sleeping wolf clutching the soil
elements.action: feels time weave through claws

source_lines: On a certain track you imagine yourself as a pile of leaves on top of a chemical mountain
In her hovercraft is possession the poetry of obstruction
On radial Neptune sleeping wolf clutches at the earth feeling the texture of time

visions.title: Alpha house gauntlet
visions.summary: A suburban living room runs like a talk-show gauntlet where alpha crowns change hands under TV glare.

elements.image: garage driveway glowing with blue television light
elements.action: cars idle while arrivals rehearse sarcastic jokes

elements.image: circle of friends scoring each comment
elements.action: beer bottles clack as approval nods shift

elements.image: designer couch draped in branded throws
elements.action: someone whispers about who is alpha tonight

source_lines: Americans think in movies. We drive a car down a sketchy drveway.
Whoever is alpha male changes from night to night.
They are terrified of people being weird.

visions.title: Bubble-wrap portrait arcade
visions.summary: An arcade gallery hums with chain sounds while bubble-wrapped frames reveal layered family histories.

elements.image: marble corridor with soft blanket of sound
elements.action: unidentified chains sway above visitors

elements.image: bubble-wrapped portraits of newborns and immigrant families
elements.action: faces smile through protective film

elements.image: pop-art portrait winking from the far wall
elements.action: neon colors pulse like a flirtatious signal

source_lines: Cooing of gentle conversation in the arcade
Walls covered in bubble wrap, fragments of photo frames .
Immigrant families in colonial frills smile peacefully out at you
A sassy middle aged woman ... winking suggestively

visions.title: Celebrity dining rehab
visions.summary: Dinner tables and rehab halls merge into a collage where pop icons perform sincerity under fluorescent lights.

elements.image: Chinese restaurant table stacked with golden pig dishes
elements.action: Justin raps about global poverty while cameras hover

elements.image: tattoo shaped like a spoiled gargoyle
elements.action: patrons lean back, startled

elements.image: rehab ward corridor where Magic Johnson wanders in patient garnet
elements.action: artists exchange ring-modulator ideas

source_lines: Justin Bieber and his girlfriend having dinner at a Chinese restaurant.
Everyone is frightened by Justin's new tattoo
Magic Johnson is a rehab
It's where all the creatives go

visions.title: Engine oil rehearsal
visions.summary: In a warehouse stage, performers balance engine oil, wobbling horns, and magnetic ink like instruments.

elements.image: performer clutching a bag of engine oil against their stomach
elements.action: breath syncs with the weight

elements.image: plastic horns quivering on stands
elements.action: tones wobble before settling

elements.image: bleeping red light beside magnetic ink sheets
elements.action: warning pulses keep rhythm

source_lines: hold a bag of engine oil inside a sore stomach
plastic horns wobble their before quivering tunes
bleeping red light holds tounges
which hold magnetic ink for a final favour for my friend

poem_snapshots.excerpt: a dark workshop of telephone wires all of which lead to an indifferent love
notable_lines: capture her hand in the neon furnace
making phone calls through an octal system of severed wires
and ill float down stream and burn inside the neon furnace
key_images: telephone workshop welded to neon heat

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Checked myself for wounds turns out I have a few
notable_lines: Ratchets on the other end of the line
Porcelaine horn machine guns
Only flood lights lead me home
key_images: industrial phone call chewing through ratchets
machine gun horns lining grey rooms

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Everytime I feel fire in me your gutteral occurrence returns
notable_lines: I figure it out in my dream where I am burnt to smithereens
By your style of conversation
I watch myself crumble

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Fireflies rise from purple shadow empty man surrender to the stars
notable_lines: He doesn't speak
Surfboard sunset
key_images: silent figure under extraterrestrial surf light

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Folsom prison badger holds his penis in two minds
notable_lines: Look at the men on the bench they are more fit for the solution
Fire between us all tonight
Take me back to Melbourne take me back to my back home back
key_images: bench-lined arena lit by communal fire

poem_snapshots.excerpt: I feel a spectral copy of my body like a soul escape my me for a moment
notable_lines: The faint purple outline lifts from the skin on my head
It twists horizontally its face my face stretches wide open
Bites violently at the frail air

poem_snapshots.excerpt: My mother is crying and syrup drips from the spoon eyes wrinkled like old stars
notable_lines: Father fetches the stick and closes the doors to the theatre room
The two brothers meet for a final time inside a volcano
He is in a cardboard box travelling towards the moon
key_images: cardboard spacecraft launching from the living room

poem_snapshots.excerpt: How about a tropical island I don't like to fly
notable_lines: Let's have some babies in the Bermuda Triangle
Ride into th future with a piece of bacon and a cook book
Feature films make me nauseous
key_images: bacon-smeared road trip into the future

poem_snapshots.excerpt: On a certain track you imagine yourself as a pile of leaves on top of a chemical mountain
notable_lines: Your doppel ganger takes your hand
Before light beams guide you to different paths
Cake penis avenge my death
key_images: doppelganger grasp in vacant car lot

poem_snapshots.excerpt: The men on board Are false alarms it's all logistics to them
notable_lines: I'd like to acquire your system if you don't mind me asking
Everyone loves him he's very mad about the trains
I just threw up in the shower false alarm

poem_snapshots.excerpt: The music was horrible so we put on our headphones and spoke to each other through microphones
notable_lines: Filter words through smooth beautiful blue thought
A quiet world we share together
Frame unto frame unto frame the visions of our now moment
key_images: private sound bubble within a loud venue

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Watching the stage from afar with my binoculars
notable_lines: The girl with all the makeup does the styling for that band that started techno
There's a pop up restaurant where you can listen to techno
But I'll Watch the show with my binoculars
key_images: stylist painting performers in neon light

poem_snapshots.excerpt: One of these days I'm going to find myself away from this island which splits my material self
notable_lines: Her blond luscious memory constricts magenta blood
to where i held my captive stranger
to make myself a home in a wild forest
key_images: forest home built for a captive stranger

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Americans think in movies. We drive a car down a sketchy drveway.
notable_lines: Group think at a maximum.
Whoever is alpha male changes from night to night.
They are terrified of people being weird.
key_images: driveway lit like a horror opener
living room scoreboard for alpha status

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Cooing of gentle conversation in the arcade , unifentified chains clink from the soft blanket of sound
notable_lines: Walls covered in bubble wrap, fragments of photo frames .
Immigrant families in colonial frills smile peacefully out at you
A sassy middle aged woman ... winking suggestively

poem_snapshots.excerpt: Justin Bieber and his girlfriend having dinner at a Chinese restaurant.
notable_lines: Everyone is frightened by Justin's new tattoo
He licks the golden pig juice from the fork
Magic Johnson is a rehab

poem_snapshots.excerpt: hold a bag of engine oil inside a sore stomach
notable_lines: plastic horns wobble their before quivering tunes
bleeping red light holds tounges
i quiver between the two networks which hold magnetic ink
